name: Demolition Master - Destruction Simulator
description:
This simulator is about destructions! Watch towers collapse in rain of rockets.
Weaponry
Different types of guns: missiles, cascade grenades, dynamite
Some nature powers: lightnings, tornado

Maps
45 prebuilt maps. (More to come)
Create one yourself in the editor!

Fire
The wood burns in real life... it burns in this game too!

Campaign
Destroy constructions with limited weaponry!
Sandbox
Or destroy whatever you like as you like it!

Gameplay
Full control of gameplay - fly as a ghost player or switch to a physical body, slow down the time freeze it, change gravity, increase debris amount and enable additional debris effect, increase/reduce objects HP or the force they hold to each other, and much more...
